nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state*
nodes.name: pause

nodes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
nodes.name: unpause

nodes.documentation: @dev Prevent the token from ever being paused again*
nodes.name: notPausable

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
attributes.name: whenNotPaused

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
attributes.name: whenPaused

attributes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state*
attributes.name: pause

attributes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
attributes.name: unpause

attributes.documentation: @dev Prevent the token from ever being paused again*
attributes.name: notPausable

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

notPausable().details: Prevent the token from ever being paused again*

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state*

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
